direct_enhancements.method_name: sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve sending signed requests with similar parameters and control flows.
Both methods retrieve transaction history but with different endpoints.
Both methods require signature generation for secure requests.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a RequestHandler instance to be initialized.
Both methods require proxy authentication setup before making requests.
Both methods need to verify the response format and handle exceptions similarly.
